website_summaries.verdict: A cult favorite, award-winning mineral foundation that has been recognized by Allure magazine for many years for the excellent coverage, numerous colors, and quality ingredients.
pros: Loose mineral powder foundation that has been a top-seller since it was introduced
Provides buildable coverage and produces a finish that looks natural
Includes SPF 15 and is available in 30 shades
cons: Can be a bit difficult to find the perfect matching color, especially if your skin tone is light
May feel dry if you already have very dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Product the is not real. Compare pics. The one with grey lettering is fake. II knew immediately when I opened it. So I bought directly from the company and confirmed. The smell texture everything. Can’t fool someone who has been using this product since it first came out. Shame on amazon for allowing this. 2nd product that is fake on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Tamira Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit BareMinerals! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake BareMinerals. In the pictures, the container on the left is (real) BareMinerals and the container on the right is the one I received in the mail. The packaging is different and the color is very orange and does not cover. I have used BareMinerals for the past 10 years and there is no way this is a REAL BareMinerals foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not Bare Mineral foundation>>>>period.!!..DO NOT BUY IT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using Bare Mineral foundation for over 15 years...since is getting little expensive buying at Ulta or Sephora..I was going to try to get cheaper...it feels awful on my face,doesn't cover anything...I'm very disappointed ,I'm asking what was in it.???..Bare Mineral is loosing their reputation by selling this kind of product here...went to Sephora and got my Bare Mineral there...huge difference !!!
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS MY FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: This product has Always been my favorite & Always will be . When I ordered I was told it will take several days too receive. Actually I received it days early than expected. No Doubt, This is a Item I Will be back for .
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: genuine?
customer_reviews.text: Before purchase I double checked the UPC number to make sure it was the same. Yep - the same. When I started using the product, I noticed that it smells like talcum powder - which I never noticed with the original. Also after use, the brush with the original product is usually stiff. With this product the bristles are really soft. It seems like I'm using more on each application to get the same coverage as my previous genuine purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: No lid included
customer_reviews.text: Really not happy that this loose powder makeup showed up without a lid. It needs a lid and should have come with one. Can't put this in my makeup bag. Not a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Never received in mail
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as I have used it for years and I purchased because great price and it was the right colour for me which is hard to find. I purchased many make up items at the same time and I did not realise until asked to review I never received the product. I recently moved so it may have been lost in the mail or in “return to sender”
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect make-up great coverage no mess
customer_reviews.text: Perfect make-up great coverage and so easy to apply. Just the right shade for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Forstein

customer_reviews.title: Yep, good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Well, since I did not buy this stuff, (my wife did) I cannot honestly give it a rating for its stated purpose in life. However, I can give a rating to my wife once she use the product and it made her "bee-u-t-full!!!!" She is a joy to behold anyway, but this stuff made her even nicer to get ahold of. After 42 years of married life, I still like to get ahold of the women. Hope that helps somebody out there in Amazon land.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I can buy this on amazon!!! Perfect color for me. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Facial powder.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to blend well, as long as you get the right shade.

customer_reviews.title: best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: been using it over 10 years and I think it really has helped condition and protect my skin.

customer_reviews.title: Foundation
customer_reviews.text: A little darker than my original but otherwise the same product. Would by again

customer_reviews.title: I like this powder
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look closely at the size before buying. I thought it was the big jar. It's small but this stuff lasts a long time. I've always liked this powder.

customer_reviews.title: Powder

customer_reviews.title: About 1/4 th full
customer_reviews.text: The jar was way less than half full. Don’t tell me about settling during shipment., it can be settled before shipoing

customer_reviews.title: Tried, tested & true. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only make-up I use because of its great coverage, easy application, easy wash off. Really excited to be able to get it on Amazon, instead of having to go to the store.

customer_reviews.title: 5++ Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love. Fast shipping. When ordered from Bare Mineral my order took 2-3 weeks. But I just come here now 2days!

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked really well for me and I will but again.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for olive complected skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing bare minerals for years. My mom got me a starter kit about 7 years ago, and I've been hooked ever since. I always wore medium beige but noticed that it really didn't match my skin just right. I looked it up on the Bare Minerals website and decided to give it a go. It works great for my olive complected skin. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Best for Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product if you have oily skin. This product along with the right brushes will make your skin look amazing for hours.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE. Terrible product that looks super patchy and has terrible coverage. Spend more for the real product.

customer_reviews.text: Used this products for years. Great sun protection and not heavy. Love it!

customer_reviews.text: Loved the price on this! Have been using this product for years and paying a certain beauty chain's high mark-up! Very pleased with this foundation and the fast shipping.. Thank you!!

customer_reviews.text: I do like this product; the only thing I DON'T like is that you can't take off the inner part when it gets down low and it's difficult to get to the last bit and I want to use every last bit! :)

customer_reviews.text: I matched it to a medium tan matte bare mineral foundation I bought from the bare minerals store and it was completely different.

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review nor received anything fake via Amazon but this product is terrible. I have used this line of makeup for 15 years. This product is not the real brand. It falls off your face, is odd color, and is not useable. Do not buy!

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

customer_reviews.title: I received the package with original on the bottom but it peeled off easily and matte was underneath it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the original. I received the package with original on the bottom but it peeled off easily and matte was underneath it. This is twice I have ordered original and have received matte.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using it for years. I only put it in the morning and it lasts me all day.

customer_reviews.text: I love that it feels as if I'm wearing nothing at all!! Med. Coverage

customer_reviews.title: stays on and nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: been using this brand for fifteen years... I blend two different shades to customize it. just don't breathe the particles. stays on well, I mainly like it for sun protection.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it goes on smooth and it makes my skin look and feel younger. I love that it's all natural. You don't have to use much to get amazing results. I have tried lots of products but I am sticking with this one
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: No seal on jar as it normally does when I've previously purchased it. Seal over powder dispensing holes was loose, seems like it might not be real bare mineral product- very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Belz

customer_reviews.title: My only makeup brand
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals is the best makeup foundation I know and I have tried quite a few. I love how it feels like you are not wearing any makeup at all. It blends with your skin and makes you glow naturally!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bare minerals for a while now and get less breakouts. I also have smoother skin. The coverage is very light so I recommend a good concealer. Otherwise I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Brandyj23

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Note that the item is bigger than typical bare minerals size. But i love the sifter since I travel a lot and it's nice to control the powder.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Only makeup I will put on my face. Once you use BE you will be hooked for life.

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Make up that's good for your skin. Feels like you're not wearing makeup at all but leaves you skin looking smooth and even.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, same as if I bought it from the store 😃

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup ever great price, cheaper than Sephora, Nordstrom, and Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: STARCAN

customer_reviews.title: They sent the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive medium tan, I received "medium". Since it's so close to fall, I'll just keep it I guess😒
customer_reviews.author: S. Strange

customer_reviews.title: Accidently ordered sweet face minerals instead last time and immediately regretted
customer_reviews.text: Really covers redness and leaves a flawless finish. Stays on well and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. Accidently ordered sweet face minerals instead last time and immediately regretted!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but can still add coverage if needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I really don’t like the feeling of liquid foundation, even the “lightweight” options or even the bb creams. However, I also don’t pack this on as full coverage either. It can cover blemishes and discoloration well though! I use a smaller brush to cover anything needed more precisely and with more product, then I go over the rest of my face lightly to blend it all. I never feel like I’m wearing make-up, which I like. Be careful though when ordering, I found out that the matte versions are a bit darker than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foundation ever! I am 55 years old and have OK skin, people stop me all the time and ask what I put on my face. It gives you a nice glow without a pancake you make up look, it hides most imperfections but does not hide your skin, if this was the only product I had I would be OK
customer_reviews.author: CPM

customer_reviews.title: Not An Original Bare Minerals Product
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe this is an original bare minerals make up. I use bare minerals faithfully and only. This makeup streaks and does not have that glow I a accustomed to. What I received doesn't cover much and makes my skin look a little ashy and a little dirty. I doesn't go on smooth. I will have to physically go into Sephora to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.  Can’t tell if it’s fake by buying online
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product multiple times. Amazon tells me 11 times from this seller and this is the first time I have noticed that it is not up to par. The colour is different from original and you have to use twice as much to get any coverage. Has a different smell. Not happy with it. My jar has the name in grey and the original was white. I have read some other reviews and believe I got a fake product. Will be heading to bare minerals directly from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel B. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Instructions should be included
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet. Spent a good deal of time trying to open without success. Finally googled and found a video on how to go about this. It shouldn’t be so difficult that it takes a video to open
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: wonderful coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to foundation. It covers doscolorations and evens out my skin tone . I love that it doesn't settle in my lines and wrinkles. Bare Minerals always makes my skin look fresher and not made up.
customer_reviews.author: Catz

customer_reviews.title: Fake product distributed?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bare minerals for years and have even ordered some on amazon in the past. However, my most recent order had a stronger smell than usual and has been causing many new skin issues that I have not previously experienced. Since I have never had this problem before and my face started breaking out with the initiation of use of this new container of bare minerals, it seems very likely that something is wrong with foundation and it makes me question if what is being sold is actually bare minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Rashi

customer_reviews.title: Just enough.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than other foundations. Easier to wear. My skin remains clear. And removing it is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Repp

customer_reviews.title: Natural Matte Finish
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation ,it gives a very natural look; all while being matte ... The coverage is medium so you may want to layer it... and it is brown girl and acne -prone skin friendly. After a few hours you may want to look into re-applying.
customer_reviews.author: takima

customer_reviews.title: They send OLD product
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a very OLD product. The powder is faded and has the OLD label on it. Fortunately it still works for me. But i think most women wouldn’t be happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Medium tan color but the color I received was Medium- a color too light for me. Unfortunately I didn’t realize immediately upon receiving so I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals is my favorite makeup. And this was such a great price
customer_reviews.author: BeBe

customer_reviews.title: Best Make Up Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and LOVE IT! Also use the mineral veil to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Bare Minerals for at least 20 years and would never change. I moisturize wIth a light lotion first, then apply. I use Bare Minerals brushes as well.
customer_reviews.author: KDM in VT

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Original Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Foundation, Medium Tan, 0.28 Ounce (BARE-269655)
product_meta.description: Color:Medium TanThis is it. Award-winning loose powder foundation that has been giving women (and men) natural-looking coverage for over 20 years.
feature_bullets: Clinically proven to promote clearer, healthier looking skin
Country of origin is United States
